subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony planned to explore free agency, he said as he prepared for the N.B.A. All-Star Game, but his “first priority” was to re-sign with his current team.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony planned to explore free agency, he said as he prepared for the N.B.A. All-Star Game, but his “first priority” was to re-sign with his current team.
